column2: Chauvin Trial Closing Statement: The Prosecution brilliantly channeled Dr. Seuss!
column5: You were told uh for example that Mr. Floyd died...  that Mr. Floyd died because his heart was too big. You heard that testimony. And Now having seen all that evidence having heard all that evidence you know the truth. And the truth of the matter is that the reason Mr. Floyd is dead is because Mr. Chauvin's heart is too small.” — Prosecutor Jerry Blackwell “… the reason Mr. Floyd is dead is because Mr. Chauvin's heart is two sizes too small.” Let’s just hope that the defense didn’t get a blue lives matter activist buried in the jury because the evidence is overwhelming and compelling that Chauvin murdered Floyd.
